name: Seville Classics 3-Shelf Commercial Utility Cart, SHE18304BZ

reviews.name: Seville Classics 3-Shelf Commercial Utility Cart, SHE18304BZ
reviews.reviewText: I am really happy with this moderately priced cart, it exceeds my expectations. This put-together-yourself cart is easy to assemble. It is sturdy, nice looking and is easy to roll about. We use it to transport items from a small kitchen area to a hospitality table in another room. I would recommend it to anyone who wants/need a nice-appearing, functional cart.
reviews.title: A Great Cart!

reviews.name: Seville Classics 3-Shelf Commercial Utility Cart, SHE18304BZ
reviews.reviewText: This cart was very easy to assemble and is very sturdy. I needed a rolling table to put my study materials on to use in different places in my house. This cart is perfect - narrow enough to go through all the doors and fit into small spaces. The heavy-duty casters are a prime feature of this cart. It is in use everyday!
reviews.title: 11 February 2010

reviews.name: Seville Classics 3-Shelf Commercial Utility Cart, SHE18304BZ
reviews.reviewText: This item was purchased for a business. Assembly was easy (be sure to have a rubber mallet). It looks fine - and maneuvers easily. Definately would recommend this to anyone.
reviews.title: Exactly what was expected

reviews.name: Seville Classics 3-Shelf Commercial Utility Cart, SHE18304BZ
reviews.reviewText: With a hand and leg disability, I needed a cart for converting multiple trips to a single step process -- taking eating tray and drink to bedroom, taking grocery bags from car to house, laundry from garage to house. Didn't use middle shelf so I could load more onto bottom shelf. Yes, it's heavy to put together but very durable, and very easy to roll on vinyl and carpet. Not as heavy as a wood kitchen cart and not flimsy like cheaper model. Gives me more stability when walking than my walker. Love it!!!
reviews.title: excellent product for disabled

reviews.name: Seville Classics 3-Shelf Commercial Utility Cart, SHE18304BZ
reviews.reviewText: I bought this rolling cart to hold a small ceramics kiln. It is so sturdy that the cart easily accommodates it's 74 pound weight. The two shelves hold some clay and supplies. My only complaint is the the directions could be a little clearer, but after a couple of fits and starts I did get it together with out the use of even a rubber mallet!!
reviews.title: Excellent!!
